class.name: G4MFBufferView4D
class.brief_description: Untyped slice or view into a G4MF buffer.
class.description: G4MFBufferView4D is a class that represents a slice or view into a G4MF buffer. As an analogy with computer storage drives, if a buffer is a disk and an accessor is a file system, then a buffer view is a partition.

method.name: from_dictionary
method.description: Creates a new [G4MFBufferView4D] from the given dictionary representing the JSON data of the G4MF buffer view. This is used when importing the buffer view from a file.

method.name: load_buffer_view_data
method.description: Loads the slice of data this buffer view points to from the corresponding G4MF buffer into a [PackedByteArray].

method.name: to_dictionary
method.description: Returns a dictionary representing the JSON data of the G4MF buffer view. This is used to serialize the buffer view to a file when exporting.

members.member: The index of the buffer this buffer view points to. This is the index of the buffer in the G4MF buffers array.
The length of the buffer view in bytes. This is the size of the slice of data this buffer view points to.
The offset of the buffer view in bytes. This is the start of the slice in bytes from the start of the buffer.
